summary: Rougher, grainier textures for many of the stock armors with adjustments to normal maps, coloring and resolution where needed.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrimnexus.com/imageshare/images/1603876-1323393918.png[/img]
This is a simple texture mode; and my first submitted mod.

I have ran through decent subset of the armor textures and tweaked them a bit more to my likening; in a hand full I found 256x256 textures and upped the resolution for a bit more detail; sharpened the images and adjusted coloring in a few cases to give a slight grainier look. 
In the case of the Dark Brotherhood and the Blades armor coloring was adjusted and made a bit more neutral.

Being as simple as it is I wouldnt expect any major issues but let me know if you run into anything or if you have suggestions. Assuming all goes well I hope to expand the mod into an armor replacer once the creation kit has been released.
author: Loden DarkStar

files.name: DarkStar Textures - Armor v1-1-1
files.changelogHtml:
Added Forsworn armor armor and new normal maps
Updated the Dark Brotherhood texture see the images section

files.name: DarkStar Textures - Armor v1-2-0
files.changelogHtml:
Added Imperial and Iron armor sets
Adjusted a few of the lower (512) gloves up to (1024) for better detail

files.name: DarkStar Textures - Armor v2-0-0
files.changelogHtml:
Added daedric armor
Added a few of the lower resolution \"cloth\" armors like Jester
Upped more of the lower resolution files
